__e: A guy gets picked up for something, whatever, he calls the guy with the list who lets them all know the other guy's in trouble before the Feds can get to them.
Ohmigod I know, but the lengths they go to, lookit me, you have no idea.
It's only a matter of time before they come for you, too,
Oh, just stopped by to pick up a few things before the parents arrive.
Hey, man, why aren't you in town with everybody else waiting for the results to come in?
You got about two minutes until our backup shows up unless you tell us where the money is.
Hey look, man, where do you think my intel comes from?
Oh, and I've got to get to work, too, before all the single gals show up.
I'm waiting for one more test to come back, and if the results are what I think they are,
I got to get to the library, check out some special books before anyone else.
So we have a few moments before the others get here.
Well, before anyone joins us, I'm glad of this chance for a little talk.
So who calls 91 1, asks for help, says they're dying and then cuts out before help can arrive?
Don't-- don't they say that when you're in trouble, you just stay put wherever you are and wait till help comes?
Well, before anyone joins us, I'm glad of this chance for a little talk.
Maybe you should just... run along home before the others get here.
It's only a matter of time before my security gets through.
Well, oh! First-day flowers, what's the point if they get here at the end of the day? Right?
I don't know how much news you were getting in prison, but apparently the councilman was...
I think between the gunshot and the head bashing, my visions are coming in kind of crazy, but I can see them.
Well, they better get here soon. I can't host this Thanksgiving dinner on my own.
